tool_description: Search videos from YouTube, you can download them, get details and more quickly and effectively.
name: Easy Youtube
title: Easy Youtube

api_list.name: Get Video Details
api_list.description: Get advanced details about a specific video.

api_list.name: Download Video (MP4)
api_list.description: Get the link to download a video.

api_list.name: Download Audio (MP3/Webm)
api_list.description: Get the link so you can stream/download a song

api_list.name: Search Video
api_list.description: Make a query that returns a list of maximum 20 videos.
